solution_line_template: If the company was producing {initial_daily_production} toilet paper per day, when it ramped up its toilet paper production {increase_multiplier} times per day, it produced {increase_multiplier}*{initial_daily_production} = {increased_amount_per_day} more per day.

The total toilet production by the company increased to {initial_daily_production}+{increased_amount_per_day} = <<{initial_daily_production}+{increased_amount_per_day}={total_daily_production}>>{total_daily_production}

In March, with {days_in_march} days, the company produced a total of {total_daily_production}*{days_in_march} = <<{total_daily_production}*{days_in_march}={total_production_march}>>{total_production_march} toilet papers
